conjunction with the first mouse button to simulate the behavior of the
second and third mouse buttons in trackball mode. Particularly useful
for Macs, or laptops with limited mouse buttons. transform-cache bool 1 Set this true to enable the cache of TransformState objects. Using
the cache saves time computing transforms and inverse transforms, but
imposes some overhead for maintaining the cache itself. unambiguous-graph bool 0 Set this true to make ambiguous path warning messages generate an
assertion failure instead of just a warning (which can then be trapped
with assert-abort). undecorated bool 0 This specifies the default value of the 'undecorated' window
property. When this is true, the default window is created without a
title bar or resizable border. uniquify-attribs bool 1 Set this true to ensure that equivalent RenderAttribs are
pointerwise equal. This may improve caching performance, but also adds
additional overhead to maintain the cache, including the need to check
